mapper.select: select t1.plan_id as planId, t4.group_name as groupName, t5.name as workstationName, SUM(t.work_time) as sumWorkTime from bu_repair_task_staff_arrange t left join bu_work_order t1 on t1.id = t.order_id left join bu_repair_plan t2 on t2.id = t1.plan_id left join bu_work_order_task_workstation t3 on t3.id = t.ord_tsk_wk_station_id left join bu_mtr_workshop_group t4 on t4.id = t1.group_id left join bu_mtr_workstation t5 on t5.id = t3.workstation_id where t2.line_id = #{lineId} and t2.repair_program_id = #{repairProgramId} group by t1.plan_id, t4.group_name, t5.name
